en.title: {{B.Sc.}} in Electrical and Electronic Engineering
en.institution: Pabna University of Science and Technology
en.text: As a recent graduate in Electrical and Electronic Engineering (EEE) from Pabna University of Science and Technology (PUST), I possess a robust foundation in core engineering principles, including power systems, electronics, control systems, and telecommunications. My academic training was reinforced through hands-on laboratory work and project-based learning, equipping me with strong analytical and problem-solving skills to approach complex technical challenges. I am proficient in applying theoretical knowledge to practical scenarios, with a keen interest in the evolving landscapes of power generation and electronic design.

en.title: {{H.S.C}} (Higher Secondary School Certificate)
en.text: Alamdanga Govt. College, where I completed my Higher Secondary Certificate (HSC) examination. This foundational period instilled in me a strong discipline for learning and a keen interest in the sciences, which paved the way for my higher education. Building upon that base, I recently graduated with a degree in Electrical and Electronic Engineering (EEE) from Pabna University of Science and Technology (PUST)

en.title: {{S.S.C}} (Secondary School Certificate)
en.institution: Hardi Mir Samsuddin Ahmed Secondary School
en.text: Hardi Mir Samsuddin Ahmed Secondary School, where I completed my Secondary School Certificate (SSC), fostering an early discipline for academic excellence and a growing curiosity for scientific principles. I further developed this foundation at Alamdanga Degree College during my Higher Secondary Certificate (HSC) studies, where my interest in Mathematics and Physics Chemistry my decision to pursue a career in engineering. This path led me to Pabna University of Science and Technology (PUST), where I recently graduated with a degree in Electrical and Electronic Engineering (EEE).
